titles.title: Christian II King of Denmark, 1523 [Verso of the title-page]

classification.condition: Used in:  Illvstrissimi Et Invictissimi Principis, [...] Responsio, M. Lotter 1524, Wittenberg/Leipzig (Verso of the title-page)

pageContext.description: Portrait of Christian II, King of Denmark; half-length; three-quarter face to right, wearing the collar of the Golden Fleece; situated under a round arch,decorated with escutcheons; below, on a ledge is a tablet with text; used on verso of the title-page to Cornelius Scepperus, Illvstrissimi Et Invictissimi Principis, Domini Christierni eius nominis secundi Danie ... regis ... ad emissos contra se Lubicensium articulos, quibus suscepti aduersus eum belli ratione~ prescribunt ... Responsio, M. Lotter, Wittenberg or Leipzig, 1524
pageContext.dimensions:
Sheet: 16.8 x 11.9 cm
[Exhib. Cat. Düsseldorf 2017, 199, No. 105]

keywords.path: Attributes > Objekte > Cranach-Archiv > Inhalt > Bildnisse > Männliche Bildnisse > Fürstliche Personen > 010402010205

publications.pageNumber: Rückseite des Titelblatts# verso of title-page
publications.title: Scepperus 1524

pageContext.signature:
Artist's insignia at the bottom: winged serpent facing left and dated '1523'
[cda 2018]
